task: Find the word quoted in distaste for dragon depictions in Emily Midkiff's June 2014 article in a journal related to Hreidmar's son.
plan_summary: Use web surfing to locate Emily Midkiff's article from June 2014 in a journal associated with one of Hreidmar's sons. Find and retrieve the word quoted by two authors in distaste for dragon depictions.

steps.title: Identify the journal associated with Hreidmar's son
steps.details: Search online to identify which of Hreidmar's sons is associated with a journal and find the journal's name.

steps.title: Find Emily Midkiff's article from June 2014
steps.details: Once the journal is identified, search for Emily Midkiff's article published in June 2014 within that journal.

steps.title: Extract the quoted word in distaste from the article
steps.details: Review Emily Midkiff's article to find the word that was quoted by two different authors in distaste for the nature of dragon depictions.
